name: canvas-helper-extension
description: Chrome extension for downloading Canvas course files

scripts.build: echo "Extension is ready to use - no build step required"
scripts.dev: echo "Load the extension in Chrome at chrome://extensions/ in developer mode"
scripts.package: echo "Use chrome://extensions/ > Pack extension to create .crx file"
scripts.test: echo "Navigate to a Canvas course page and test the extension"

author: hackPSU Team
